title: How do I change the types of adverts shown in my game?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I wish to change the types of adverts that show in my game to avoid showing adverts that my users may not like.

sections.title: Cause
content: Your application is showing adverts that are not targeted towards your game's audience or you simply wish to optimize the types of adverts shown.

sections.title: Resolution
content: In order to optimize the categories of adverts that your game presents to your users then follow the steps below:
1. Log in to your Unity account here.
3. Click on the project that you wish to edit.
4. Click on the platform that you wish to edit
Note: The reason they're on the Platform level is because the categories are slightly different between platforms.
6. You can now select the categories that you wish to exclude from being shown in your game's adverts. Click the Save button when you are done.
7. Once saved, you will be able to see all the categories that are now excluded.

sections.title: More Information
content: If you wish to whitelist only ads suitable for everyone then you can do so by sending a request to the support team. This is called activating "Family Friendly" mode. Please provide your Game IDs when submitting this request.
